accessibility._instruction: Add the accessibility of the data for this dataset version.

authors._instruction: Add one or several authors (person or organization) that contributed to the production and publication of this dataset version.

custodians._instruction: Add one or several custodians (person or organization) that are responsible for this dataset version.

description._instruction: Enter a description (abstract) for this dataset (max. 200 words; no references).

developers._instruction: Add one or several developers (person or organization) that contributed to the code implementation needed to produce or use this dataset version.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this dataset version.

ethicsAssessment._instruction: Add the result of the ethics assessment of this dataset version.

fullDocumentation._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of a full documentation of this dataset version.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (title) for this dataset version.

funding._instruction: Add all funding information of this dataset version.

hasAlternativeVersions._instruction: Add all dataset versions that can be used alternatively to this dataset version.

hasSupplementVersions._instruction: Add all dataset versions that supplement this dataset version.

homepage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this dataset version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the dataset version preceding this dataset version.

license._instruction: Add the license of this dataset version.

modality._instruction: Add all modalities in which the approaches used in this dataset version can be categorized in.

otherContributions._instruction: Add the contributions for each involved person or organization going beyond being an author, custodian or developer of this dataset version.

relatedPublications._instruction: Add further publications besides the documentation (e.g. an original research article) providing the original context for the production of this dataset version.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date (actual or intended) of the first broadcast/publication of this dataset version.

repository._instruction: Add the file repository of this dataset version.

shortName._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this dataset version (max. 30 characters, no space).

studyTarget._instruction: Add all study targets of this dataset version.

type._instruction: Add all data types (raw, derived or simulated) provided in this dataset version.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this dataset version.

versionInnovations._instruction: Enter a short summary of the novelties/peculiarities of this dataset version.
